Parameters.Name: Audio Output Configuration – Audio Output Configurations and Audio Output Configuration Options Consisvetcy

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfList

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - Max=Min, 2 AOC in audioOutputConfList

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: audioOutputConfiguration.SendPrimacy not specified in first AOC
Test.Description: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfList

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfList
Test.Description: audioOutputConfiguration.SendPrimacy not specified in first and second AOC For second AOC audioOutputConfiguration.SendPrimacy is not in Options.OutputTokensAvailable

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Correct response - Max=Min, 1 AOC in audioOutputConfList

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Options.OutputLevelRange.Min > Options.OutputLevelRange.Max in first AOCOptions
Test.Description: Wrong response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfList

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Annex 18: audio output configuration list is empty
Test.Description: Wrong response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfList

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: audioOutputConfiguration.OutputToken is not in Options.OutputTokensAvailable
Test.Description: Wrong response - there is 2 AOC in audioOutputConfList

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Wrong response - audioOutputConfiguration.SendPrimacy specified and is not in options for 2nd AOC
Test.Description: If audioOutputConfiguration.SendPrimacy is not in Options.OutputTokensAvailable, FAIL the test and skip other steps

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Wrong value in 2nd AOC. OutputLevel less than OutputLevelRange.Min
Test.Description: If audioOutputConfiguration.OutputLevel less than Options.OutputLevelRange.Min, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Wrong value in 2nd AOC. OutputLevel > than OutputLevelRange.Max
Test.Description: If audioOutputConfiguration.OutputLevel > than Options.OutputLevelRange.Max, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.TestName: Audio Output Configuration – Get Audio Output Configuration Options
Test.Name: Wrong response - audioOutputConfiguration.SendPrimacy specified and is not in options for all AOC
Test.Description: If audioOutputConfiguration.SendPrimacy is not in Options.OutputTokensAvailable, FAIL the test and skip other steps
